TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlType extends System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier

summary.span: 識別使用者介面 (UI) 控制項的類型。

span.span: Identifies the type of a user interface (UI) control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繼承自並用來識別控制項所代表的型別。 inherits from and is used to identify the type of a control represented by an . 控制項類型取決於使用者介面自動化提供者的開發人員。The control type is determined by the developer of the UI Automation provider. 這個類別包含靜態欄位，它們各自物件，來識別控制項的標準的類型。This class contains static fields, which are themselves objects, to identify the standard types of controls. 另外還有類型不符合其中一種定義類型的控制項。There is also a type for controls that do not match one of the defined types. 其中一個控制項的控制項類型可能會在執行階段變更的唯一情況是，此控制項支援。The only case where a control's control type might change at run time is where the control supports . 例如，[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]清單檢視中，它可以是或，取決於目前的檢視。An example is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] list view, which can be a or , depending on the current view. 控制項類型沒有一對一的等價控制項模式。Control types do not have a one-to-one equivalence to control patterns. 控制項可以是只有一個類型，但它可能會支援多個模式或任何模式，根據其特定的功能。A control can be of only one type, but it may support multiple patterns or no patterns at all, depending on its specific functionality. 如需各種的詳細資訊控制型別，請參閱 < [UI Automation Control Types](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-control-types.md)。For detailed information on the various control types, see [UI Automation Control Types](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-control-types.md).

related.span: UI 自動化控制項類型概觀

span.span: UI Automation Control Types Overview

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Button
Public Shared ReadOnly Button As ControlType

summary.span: 識別按鈕控制項。

span.span: Identifies a button control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按鈕來執行單一動作時按下。Buttons perform a single action when clicked. 按鈕可以用於做為獨立控制項，或為另一個控制項型別中的子控制項使用。A button can be used as a standalone control or as a subcontrol in another control type. 例如，在下拉式方塊控制項中的下拉式箭號是一個按鈕。For example, the drop-down arrow in a combo box control is a button. 當做子控制項使用時，按鈕是中的控制項檢視[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]樹狀目錄中的 （不在內容檢視中）。When used as a subcontrol, a button is in the control view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree (not in the content view).

related.span: Button 控制項類型的 UI 自動化支援

span.span: UI Automation Support for the Button Control Type

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Calendar
Public Shared ReadOnly Calendar As ControlType

summary.span: 識別月曆控制項，例如日期選擇器。

span.span: Identifies a calendar control, such as a date-picker.

related.span: Calendar 控制項類型的 UI 自動化支援

span.span: UI Automation Support for the Calendar Control Type

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType CheckBox
Public Shared ReadOnly CheckBox As ControlType

summary.span: 識別核取方塊控制項。

span.span: Identifies a check box control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用核取方塊，為獨立控制項或在另一種控制項類型的子控制項使用。A check box can be used as a standalone control or as a subcontrol in another control type. 比方說，核取方塊來選取資料列 （用來管理其內容） 的方格控制項中的資料列的開頭會出現在控制項檢視中，但不是在內容檢視中。For example, a check box at the beginning of a row in a grid control that is used to select the row (used to manipulate the content) appears in the control view but not in the content view. 不過，加上標籤的核取方塊，代表資料的形式是中的內容和控制項的檢視。However, a labeled checkbox in a form that represents data is in the content and control views.

related.span: CheckBox 控制項類型的 UI 自動化支援

span.span: UI Automation Support for the CheckBox Control Type

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType ComboBox
Public Shared ReadOnly ComboBox As ControlType

summary.span: 識別下拉式方塊控制項。

span.span: Identifies a combo box control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有兩種變化的下拉式方塊控制項。There are two variations of combo box controls. 簡單的下拉式方塊會顯示使用者可以從選取的清單。A simple combo box presents a list that a user can select from. 可編輯的下拉式方塊呈現選擇清單，並也有 使用者可以在這裡輸入而不是受到限制的選擇，選取 從清單中選擇一個可編輯的文字區域。An editable combo box presents a list of choices and also has an editable text area where a user can type in a choice instead of being limited to selecting from the choices in the list.

related.span: ComboBox 控制項類型的 UI 自動化支援

span.span: UI Automation Support for the ComboBox Control Type

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Custom
Public Shared ReadOnly Custom As ControlType

summary.span: 識別不屬於已定義之控制項類型的控制項。

span.span: Identifies a control that is not one of the defined control types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的控制項型別表示不會識別為其中一個預先定義的控制項類型的控制項 (例如或)。The control type indicates a control that is not identified as one of the predefined control types (such as or ). 控制項開發人員應該檢查的其他控制項類型，再指定做為其控制控制項以確保其控制項不會提供相同的功能，做為其中一個定義的控制項類型的類型。Control developers should check the other control types before designating their control as a control type to be sure that their control does not provide the same functionality as one of the defined control types. A控制項類型需要額外的工作，讓提供者實作[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]。A control type requires extra work for the provider to implement [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]. 此外，使用者介面自動化用戶端產品將無法預期控制項結構、 鍵盤互動，以及可能的控制項模式，根據控制項的控制項型別。Also, UI Automation client products will not be able to anticipate the control structure, keyboard interaction, and possible control patterns based on the control type of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType DataGrid
Public Shared ReadOnly DataGrid As ControlType

summary.span: 識別資料格控制項。

span.span: Identifies a data grid control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當資料格只包含文字時，應該是控制項類型。When the cells contain only text, the control type should be .

related.span: DataGrid 控制項類型的 UI 自動化支援

span.span: UI Automation Support for the DataGrid Control Type

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType DataItem
Public Shared ReadOnly DataItem As ControlType

summary.span: 識別資料項目控制項。

span.span: Identifies a data item control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是複雜的項目可以包含許多其他控制項。A is a complex item that can contain many other controls.

related.span: DataItem 控制項類型的 UI 自動化支援

span.span: UI Automation Support for the DataItem Control Type

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Document
Public Shared ReadOnly Document As ControlType

summary.span: 識別文件控制項。

span.span: Identifies a document control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文件包含多行文字內容。A document contains text content of more than one line.

related.span: Document 控制項類型的 UI 自動化支援

span.span: UI Automation Support for the Document Control Type

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Edit
Public Shared ReadOnly Edit As ControlType

summary.span: 識別編輯控制項，例如文字方塊。

span.span: Identifies an edit control, such as a text box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可以用為獨立控制項或在另一種控制項類型的子控制項使用。An control can be used as a standalone control or as a subcontrol in another control type. 例如，使用者可以在這裡輸入的值下拉式方塊控制項中的區域是控制項，並在此情況下控制項不是內容檢視的一部分。For example, the area where a user can type in a value in a combo box control is an control, and in this case the control is not part of the content view. 控制項也可以代表包含密碼的控制項。 controls can also represent controls that contain passwords. 屬性可讓產品，例如螢幕助讀程式知道是否要顯示的內容。The property enables products such as screen readers to know whether to reveal the contents.

related.span: Edit 控制項類型的 UI 自動化支援

span.span: UI Automation Support for the Edit Control Type

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPattern[] GetNeverSupportedPatterns() cil managed

summary.span: 擷取控制項型別不支援的模式識別項。

span.span: Retrieves the pattern identifiers that are not supported by the control type.
An array of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] pattern identifiers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可用於使用者介面自動化用戶端，例如測試架構，提供者實作需要找出不允許使用此控制項類型的所有控制項模式。This method is useful for UI Automation clients such as test frameworks for a provider implementation that need to find all control patterns that are not permitted on this control type. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫每個類型的中的靜態欄位包含類別。The following example calls on every kind of contained as a static field in the class. [!code-csharp[UIAControlTypePatterns_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAControlTypePatterns_snip/CSharp/GetPatternsForm.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAControlTypePatterns_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAControlTypePatterns_snip/visualbasic/getpatternsform.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPattern[][] GetRequiredPatternSets() cil managed

summary.span: 擷取必要模式集合的陣列。

span.span: Retrieves an array of sets of required patterns.
An array of sets of required patterns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 陣列的每個項目包含陣列的模式，而且有此控制項類型的每個項目必須支援至少其中一個陣列。Each element of the array contains an array of patterns, and each element that has this control type must support at least one of these arrays. 這個方法可用於需要尋找所有可能的模式，例如測試架構提供者實作的使用者介面自動化用戶端。This method is useful for UI Automation clients that need to find all possible patterns, such as testing frameworks for a provider implementation. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫每個類型的中的靜態欄位包含類別。The following example calls on every kind of contained as a static field in the class. [!code-csharp[UIAControlTypePatterns_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAControlTypePatterns_snip/CSharp/GetPatternsForm.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAControlTypePatterns_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAControlTypePatterns_snip/visualbasic/getpatternsform.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty[] GetRequiredProperties() cil managed

summary.span: 擷取此控制項型別的必要屬性[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] 的陣列。

span.span: Retrieves an array of the required property [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] for this control type.
An array of property [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可用於需要尋找所有可能屬性的詳細資訊，例如測試架構提供者實作的使用者介面自動化用戶端。This method is useful for UI Automation clients that need to find all possible properties, such as testing frameworks for a provider implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Group
Public Shared ReadOnly Group As ControlType

summary.span: 識別群組控制項，可做為其他控制項的容器。

span.span: Identifies a group control, which acts as a container for other controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 群組是包含其他控制項類型，以及用來以邏輯方式將這些控制項的容器控制項。A group is a container control that contains different control types and is used to logically associate those controls.

related.span: Group 控制項類型的 UI 自動化支援

span.span: UI Automation Support for the Group Control Type

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Hyperlink
Public Shared ReadOnly Hyperlink As ControlType

summary.span: 識別超連結控制項。

span.span: Identifies a hyperlink control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 超連結控制項巡覽至指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)]當使用者按一下控制項上。A hyperlink control navigates to a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)] when a user clicks on the control.

related.span: Hyperlink 控制項類型的 UI 自動化支援

span.span: UI Automation Support for the Hyperlink Control Type

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Image
Public Shared ReadOnly Image As ControlType

summary.span: 識別影像控制項。

span.span: Identifies an image control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當做獨立控制項，或為另一個控制項型別中的子控制項使用，就可以使用控制項類型。An control type can be used as a standalone control or as a subcontrol in another control type. 例如，按鈕可以使用映像，而不是文字，表示其功能給使用者。For example, a button can use an image rather than text to indicate its functionality to the user. 當只用於裝飾的用途，影像會出現在控制項檢視[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]樹狀目錄中的 （不在內容檢視中）。When used only for decorative purposes, an image appears in the control view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree (not in the content view).

related.span: Image 控制項類型的 UI 自動化支援

span.span: UI Automation Support for the Image Control Type

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType List
Public Shared ReadOnly List As ControlType

summary.span: 識別清單控制項，例如清單方塊。

span.span: Identifies a list control, such as a list box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是包含控制項型別和 （可能）控制項類型。A is a control type that contains and (perhaps) control types. A控制項可以用為獨立控制項或在另一種控制項類型的子控制項使用。A control can be used as a standalone control or as a subcontrol in another control type. 例如，下拉式方塊具有控制項，其中包含當按下下拉式按鈕時出現的選項。For example, a combo box has a control that contains choices that appear when the drop-down button is clicked. 做為子控制項，當只能在控制項檢視中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]樹狀目錄中的 （不在內容檢視）。When used as a subcontrol, a is only in the control view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree (not in content view). 做為子控制項，當沒有`Name`指派的屬性。When used as a subcontrol, a does not have a `Name` property assigned. A可以包含控制項。A can contain controls.

related.span: List 控制項類型的 UI 自動化支援

span.span: UI Automation Support for the List Control Type

public: property System::String ^ LocalizedControlType { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得控制項型別的描述。

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下列範例中，反映，即可找到所有控制項類型及其屬性是輸出的其他資訊。In the following example, all control types are found by reflection, and their properties are output along with other information. [!code-csharp[UIAControlTypePatterns_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAControlTypePatterns_snip/CSharp/GetPatternsForm.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAControlTypePatterns_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAControlTypePatterns_snip/visualbasic/getpatternsform.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType LookupById(int32 id) cil managed
Public Shared Function LookupById (id As Integer) As ControlType

span.span: Identifier of the control type.

summary.span: 擷取一個可以封裝指定之數值識別項的 。

span.span: Retrieves a that encapsulates a specified numerical identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項的類型由通常物件。Normally the type of a control is identified by a object. 這個方法可讓您知道只有數字的識別碼時，建構這類物件。This method enables you to construct such an object when only the numerical identifier is known.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Menu
Public Shared ReadOnly Menu As ControlType

summary.span: 識別功能表控制項，例如應用程式視窗中最上層的功能表。

span.span: Identifies a menu control, such as a top-level menu in an application window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 功能表是功能表項目; 集合的容器比方說，控制項下方**檔案**當您按一下它，並包含**新增**，**開啟**，依此類推。A menu is a container for a collection of menu items; for instance, the control that appears beneath **File** when you click on it and that contains **New**, **Open**, and so on.

related.span: Menu 控制項類型的 UI 自動化支援

span.span: UI Automation Support for the Menu Control Type

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項型別表示的最上層功能表的 應用程式集的容器。A control type represents the container for the set of top-level menus of an application.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Pane
Public Shared ReadOnly Pane As ControlType

summary.span: 識別窗格控制項。

span.span: Identifies a pane control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A用來以視覺化方式分隔內容內。A is used to visually separate content within a . 此外，使用者通常會視內容而定，按下索引標籤、 tab、f6 或 CTRL + TAB 的窗格之間巡覽。The user typically navigates between panes by pressing TAB, F6, or CTRL+TAB, depending on the context.

related.span: Pane 控制項類型的 UI 自動化支援

span.span: UI Automation Support for the Pane Control Type

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType ScrollBar
Public Shared ReadOnly ScrollBar As ControlType

summary.span: 識別捲軸控制項，例如應用程式視窗中的捲軸。

span.span: Identifies a scroll bar control, such as a scroll bar in an application window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控制項型別包含一組按鈕和 thumb 控制項可讓使用者使用滑鼠捲動視窗或項目容器的內容。A control type contains a set of buttons and a thumb control that enable a user using a mouse to scroll the contents of a window or item container. 使用屬性來區別所對應的大型遞增、 大型遞減、 遞增小型和小型遞減按鈕項目。Use the property to differentiate between the elements that correspond to the large-increment, large-decrement, small-increment, and small-decrement buttons.

related.span: ScrollBar 控制項類型的 UI 自動化支援

span.span: UI Automation Support for the ScrollBar Control Type

Public Shared ReadOnly Separator As ControlType

summary.span: 識別分隔符號，可在控制項中建立視覺分割，例如功能表和工具列。

span.span: Identifies a separator, which creates a visual division in controls like menus and toolbars.

related.span: Separator 控制項類型的 UI 自動化支援

span.span: UI Automation Support for the Separator Control Type

Public Shared ReadOnly Slider As ControlType

summary.span: 識別滑桿控制項。

span.span: Identifies a slider control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A包含一組相關聯的按鈕控制項類型控制項，讓使用者從一組項目中選取或設定數值的範圍內。A control type consists of a set of buttons associated with an control that enable a user to select from a set of items or set a numerical value from within a range.

related.span: Slider 控制項類型的 UI 自動化支援

span.span: UI Automation Support for the Slider Control Type

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Tree
Public Shared ReadOnly Tree As ControlType

summary.span: 識別樹狀目錄控制項。

span.span: Identifies a tree control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A的控制項型別是容器的階層排列或控制項類型。A control type is a container for a hierarchical arrangement of or control types. 每個節點的樹狀結構可以包含其他節點。Each node of a tree can contain other nodes. 包含的子節點的節點可以顯示為展開或摺疊。A node that contains child nodes can be displayed as expanded or collapsed.

related.span: Tree 控制項類型的 UI 自動化支援

span.span: UI Automation Support for the Tree Control Type
